select prod.id id, prod.company_id companyId, prod.qrcode qrcode, prod.photo photo, prod.code sysCode, case when prod.source_code is null then prod.code else prod.source_code end code, prod.source_code sourceCode, prod.name name, prod.name_en nameEn, prod.spec spec, prod.genre genre, prod.property, genre.name genreName, produnit.unit unit, unit.name unitName, '1' ratio, '' prodProperty,
round(ifnull(produnit.product_price, 0), 4) price, prod.type type, type.name typeName, prod.validity_days validityDays,
prod.remark remark, prod.cuser cuser, DATE_FORMAT(prod.cdate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') cdate, prod.uuser uuser, DATE_FORMAT(prod.udate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') udate,
ifnull(prod.safety_count, 0) safetyCount, ifnull(prod.stock_count, 0) stockCount, ifnull(prod.lock_count, 0) lockCount, ifnull(prod.stock_count, 0) - ifnull(prod.lock_count, 0) productStockCount,
prod.version version, prod.isdisable isdisable, prod.picture_code pictureCode,
produnit.np_formula n2pFormula, produnit.pn_formula p2nFormula,
produnit.n2p_is_scale n2pIsScale, produnit.n2p_decimal_count n2pDecimalCount,
produnit.p2n_is_scale p2nIsScale, produnit.p2n_decimal_count p2nDecimalCount
,round(ifnull(customerPrice.product_price, 0), 4) customerPrice
from vmes_product prod left join vmes_product_unit produnit on produnit.product_id = prod.id and produnit.type = 1 left join vmes_dictionary genre on prod.genre = genre.id left join vmes_dictionary unit on produnit.unit = unit.id left join vmes_dictionary type on prod.type = type.id
left join ( select product_id,unit,customer_id,product_price,isdisable from vmes_sale_unit_price where isdisable = '1' and customer_id = #{customerId} ) customerPrice on produnit.unit = customerPrice.unit and prod.id = customerPrice.product_id
left join vmes_user cuser on prod.cuser = cuser.id left join vmes_department dept on dept.id = cuser.dept_id
and cuser.id = #{currentUserId}
and dept.id_${deptLayer} = #{deptRId}
and prod.id in ( select product_id from vmes_warehouse_product
and company_id=#{currentCompanyId}
and warehouse_id in ( select id from vmes_warehouse where company_id=#{currentCompanyId} and path_id LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{warehouseId}),'%') )
and isdisable = '1'
group by product_id )
and prod.id = #{productId}
and prod.id in (${inProductIds})
and prod.id not in (${notInProductIds})
and prod.source_code LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{sourceCode}),'%')
and ( case when prod.source_code is null then prod.code else prod.source_code end ) LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{code}),'%')
and prod.name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{name}),'%')
and genre.name = #{genreName}
and prod.name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{genreNames}),'%')
and prod.property LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{property}),'%')
and type.name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{typeName}),'%')
and unit.name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{unitName}),'%')
and prod.company_id=#{currentCompanyId}
and prod.spec LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{spec}),'%')
and prod.stock_count > 0
and prod.stock_count = 0
and prod.stock_count <> 0
and prod.genre = #{genre}
and prod.genre = '384cfd1329e648618b5a237ce1038bab'
and prod.genre <> '384cfd1329e648618b5a237ce1038bab'
and prod.genre=#{pid}
and prod.isdisable=#{isdisable}
and prod.safety_count > prod.stock_count
and prod.safety_count <= prod.stock_count
and ${queryStr}
order by ${orderStr}
